West Hartlepool, County Durham, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
Band Contest - West Hartlepool The Leeds Model Band gained the first prize of £22 10s, and a bombardon, value £18 18s, at the West Hartlepool band contest yesterday. Flower Show and Band Contest
Prizes: £22 10s and 18 guinea bombardon, 15 guineas and a 11 guinea baritone, £10 and 7 guinea cornet, £6, £3
Aug. 27, 2011, 8:15 p.m. Oct. 20, 2012, 8:42 p.m.
